events.name: Fling Fest 2012
events.about:
Sharing personal media is easier than ever thanks to innovative technology such as SmartTVs, phones, and tablets. Videon Central, Inc. has created aVia Media Player to make sharing all of your media a breeze by using its Fling feature. By using industry standard DLNA, Android, Google TV, and Kindle Fire devices that are enabled with aVia allow you to share your content with other DLNA-compatible devices. Fling makes sharing your media easy, simple, and most of all, fun! Want your friends to see vacation photos from your phone on the big screen? How about sending your new favorite song from your tablet to your phone? Just Fling!

Here at Videon, we are proud of all of the great features aVia offers, but we know the possibilities are endless for aVia! This is where we need your help! Enter Fling Fest, the 2 day hack-a-thon with a $2000 prize for the best, innovative, original use case for a flingable surface.

Come join us to discover the next generation of Fling! Who knows, maybe you hold the winning idea... 
 
To get a better idea of what aVia is all about please visit http://aviatheapp.com. 

Visit http://www.videon-central.com/flingfest for more details!
